instruction: Explain why cell phones are useful.
output: Cell phones are extremely useful and provide a multitude of functions that can help make life easier. They allow users to stay connected with loved ones by making calls, sending messages, and using various apps. Cell phones also allow you to stay up to date with news, weather, and sports. They also allow you to take photos, videos and keep track of your schedule and appointments. Cell phones are also great for entertainment with access to streaming services, games, and other apps.
